item.title: Choices
item.description: Making big desicions takes significant time and effort, a good example: Career Planning. I started thinking about my career since the day I was able to form full sentences. It was inevitable considering “What do you want to be when you grow up?” was part of the script of conversing with adults. My responce to the question varied all the time from nun to teacher to musician, to poet to doctor.
